mechanics.trigger: When you make a Charisma check
mechanics.outcome: You can replace the d20 roll with a 15

mechanics.trigger: When magic attempts to determine if you are telling the truth
mechanics.outcome: Magic indicates that you are being truthful, regardless of what you say

description_text: Until the spell ends, when you make a Charisma check, you can replace the number you roll with a 15. Additionally, no matter what you say, magic that would determine if you are telling the truth indicates that you are being truthful.
